summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3929 for the improvement of West Nickerson Street, from 3rd Avenue West to 15th Avenue West, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 47833, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
